ome.smuggler.core.types

Class MailConfigReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ome.smuggler.core.types.MailConfigReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MailConfigSource

    public class MailConfigReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements MailConfigSource
    Implements MailConfigSource by extracting and validating values from an underlying MailConfig.
